episode.title: A Vivid Nightmarescape
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Dieter Bohn joins the show to talk about Google’s new Pixel Slate Chrome OS tablet/laptop, the Pixel 3, Google’s fascinating new Night Sight camera mode, speculation on how Apple might move the Mac to ARM chips, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Dieter Bohn joins the show to talk about Google’s new Pixel Slate Chrome OS tablet/laptop, the Pixel 3, Google’s fascinating new Night Sight camera mode, speculation on how Apple might move the Mac to ARM chips, and more.

Sponsored by:

  • Casper: Get $50 off select mattresses with code talkshow. Terms and conditions apply.
  • Fracture: Your photos printed in vivid color directly on glass -- great holiday gift.
  • Banktivity: Powerful personal finance app for Mac and iOS with a great native UI. Save 10 percent on the Mac version with coupon code THETALKSHOW at checkout.

Links:

  • The late great 12-inch PowerBook G4.
  • Dieter's rather scathing review of the Pixel Slate.
  • The Verge's review of Google's Night Sight camera feature.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
